title: Sweden world cup fonts
content:
hello everyone, i have been searching through the internet to find the fonts that were used by Sweden on there national team jerseys and i can't find them. Can anyone help me?  
My email addres is [nicolaou\_constandinos@hotmail.com](mailto:nicolaou_constandinos@hotmail.com) feal free to email me

thank you Constandinos Nicolaou
author: Yoshi

comments.content:
[Here's a picture](http://web.archive.org/web/20100703024707/http:/www.n3sport.se/n3shop/Bilder/Bild2005323201050155.jpg).

Looks like a modified [Aura](http://web.archive.org/web/20100703024707/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f_id=180&dw=236) to me.

Wasn't there a font called "trivia" being given away for the world cup games from [www.fontshop.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20100703024707/http:/www.fontshop.de/ "www.fontshop.de") ?

Mikey
Yup, but that's the one from the World Cup logo, not the Swedish one.
